abstract: A former senior I.B.M. executive denied being involved in a sprawling hedge fund insider trading case and asked a court on Wednesday to dismiss civil charges by the Securities and Exchange Commission.
snippet: A former senior I.B.M. executive denied being involved in a sprawling hedge fund insider trading case and asked a court on Wednesday to dismiss civil charges by the Securities and Exchange Commission.
lead_paragraph: A former senior I.B.M. executive denied being involved in a sprawling hedge fund insider trading case and asked a court on Wednesday to dismiss civil charges by the Securities and Exchange Commission, Reuters reported.
